Subjects: human life, transitory nature of; sermons, verse in
_description: Man’s transitory life compared to a wheel, a ship, a shadow, and a flower — two couplets in a Latin sermon

BodRawC301.Transcription:
a qwheel aboute þe turnyng& a schyp in þe se
                    saylyngþat dwellyth but a lytyl stonde& to aftor þat
                    sone fadyth þat fallyth down to grownde
